extension.name: Cookie Consent Neo - Gantry Atom (Helium)
extension.author: Andreas Kar
extension.description:
Cookie Consent Neo - Atom for Gantry 5 Framework

 Andreas Kar (andreas.kar@gmx.at)

NOTE: This particle is installed for the G5 Helium.
If you want to install the particle on a different Gantry 5 template, you must manually copy the two files cookie-consent-neo.yaml and cookie-consent-neo.html.twig in /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles
